location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham at Bussora (Basra)

mods.abstract: Letter reports that a large Arab/Turkish force under Shaikh Yamar is advancing and already in possesion of Coorna and this has impacted upon trade. Letter also mentions financial and administrative issues. Shipped by Jaffir's boat.
